content: B22 2.6 22V Battery Compact 22V 2.6 Ah Li-ion battery ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Batteries, chargers, and power stations- - - ### FEATURES:Features Compact and lightweight 22V battery with improved run time Includes Hilti Cordless Power Care (CPC) technology – on-board processors monitor each battery cell to deliver more reliable, consistent and longer-lasting power on your jobsites Fully sealed electronics for increased protection against dust, humidity and water Rubberized, glass-fiber reinforced casing – up to four times more resistant to damage from dropping and twice as resistant to extreme temperatures than standard ABS plastic Casing designed to cool the battery to the ideal temperature for faster charging and reduce overload during application Applications Compatible with all Hilti 18V and 22V cordless tools Compatible with all Hilti C4/36 Li-ion chargers Applications in extreme temperature conditions – from 60° C (140° F) down to -17° C (1.4° F) Working in tight spaces where compact size and low weight are high priorities ### TECHNICAL DATA: Weight: 1.08 lb. Dimensions (LxWxH): 5.3 x 3.7 x 2.1 in Working temperature range: 1 - 140 °F Technical Data | Weight | 1.08 lb | Dimensions (LxWxH) | 5.3 x 3.7 x 2.1 in ### ITEMS- 2136395 - Battery pack B 22/2.6 Li-ion - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x B 22/2.6 Battery pack
